      public void onActionAddSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException, IOException
      Takes User input and Saves appointment Takes time and date and converts to parameters that will be accepted by MYSQL database Checks to make sure all entries have input, otherwise User error message will be generated Checks to see if any entries overlap with previous appointments, will generate user error

      Throws:
      SQLException
